Subject: ADV-2024-002 -Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0CNImy:ref ]

TextBody:
Hi Gurpal,

Yes, the email you received is legit.
The vulnerabilities can be fixed by applying the hotfix on the server and installing the upgraded clients which were also linked in the email.
If you need any assistance, please let me know and I'll schedule a short remote session so we can apply the hotfix on the server.

Best regards,
Botond Biro | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com
